guestmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. We work constantly to improve and meet your expectations. To serve our patients better, kindly spare a few minutes to fill this feedback form. Your opinion is of immense value to us.
receptionexperienceq2: Courtesy and Compassion of the guest relations Executives
registrationexperienceq2: Courtesy and Compassion by the registration Executives
nursingexperienceq1: Communication about your condition & treatment by thedoctor
nursingexperienceq2: Courtesy and Compassion of Nursing Staff
resonetitle: Please help us with the reason for your negative rating in:
recommendationmessage: Would you continue to choose our Hospitals for your future needs and recommend us to your friends and family members?
yourreasonfor: Your reason for selecting our hospital
stafservicesrecognize: Please help us recognize a staff member of our hospital who may have performed services beyond your expectations.
